summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 23, 2019. It documents operational issues, staff shortages, and notably records that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was placed on Suicide Watch. It also lists other inmates' statuses and institutional totals.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054 who was placed on Suicide Watch on July 23, 2019, as noted in the Morning Watch Shift report.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Inmate #76254-054 noted as being at a Local Hospice with USMS Guards.

persons.name: Cooper
persons.context: Inmate #85972-054 who was released from MCC New York.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was placed on Suicide Watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (where inmate Burnett was located)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was placed on Suicide Watch at MCC New York on July 23, 2019.
The report documents operational issues including an inoperative control panel for ES/GS Main Door/Fire Exit doors and an inoperative inner gate.
Staff shortages led to vacated correctional assignments on 10-South #2 and in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
A 'Fire Watch' was in progress across all three shifts (Morning, Day, Evening).
The institution's total inmate population at the beginning of the Morning Watch Shift on July 23, 2019, was 776.
